text: Ara prthibite ache pasapasi matha, ara anurera bagana o sasyaksetra o khejurera gacha -- bhira kaâ€™re o bhira na kaâ€™re -- odera pani de'oya haya eka'i pani. Ara tadera katakatake katakatara upare pradhan'ya diyechi asbadanera ksetre. Nihsandeha ete bisista nidarsana rayeche se'isaba lokera jan'ya yara bud'dhi-bibecana prayoga kare.
